name: Friends till the End
description:
Friends till the End is a fun and cute interactive fiction game (with a twist) where you talk to cute pets. Make sure to manage your time and don't neglect any pet or they will become a bit sad...

Go into the house and meet the pets, and maybe you'll be able to uncover the mysteries surrounding their situation as well...

The game has 3 different endings... Will you uncover all the secrets?

This game was made in 48 hours as a self set challenge under the theme of 'Out of power'.

Controls:

Use the mouse to interact with buttons and animals. (No controller support)

===============================

Credits:

The game was made by

Jelle Steinmann

Roel Jansen

Tim van Poppel

Used Assets:

3D geometry and props from Giant Sparrow Games & Annapura Interactive.

3D animal models made by printable_models on Free3D.

Googly Eyes made by wewwuworks on Sketchfab.

Low Poly Bone Pile made by 3dsauce on Sketchfab.

Animal Icons made by Freepik on flaticon.

BGM made by The Green Orbs - Song: Bike Rides.
